title: Five Golden Rings
description: Five bestselling authors deck the halls with romance for the holidays in this special collection of stories, each featuring an Introduction by its author. Included are Michaels' "A Bright Red Ribbon", Kat Martin's "Christmas Angel", Jo Beverley's "Twelfth Night", Katherine Sutcliffe's "Home For Christmas", and Brenda Joyce's "The Miracle".
author: Fern Michaels
